alert.note: Alert for Rawlins; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 6:52PM CDT until July 04 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Thomas County in northwestern Kansas... Southeastern Rawlins County in northwestern Kansas... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 652 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Colby, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gem. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 43 and 57. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
